sources.title: **ThoughtWorks.** "Architecture as Code: The Next Evolution." Technology Radar, 2024.
sources.summary: ThoughtWorks highlights architecture as code as a maturing discipline and outlines the organisational enablers required for adoption.

sources.title: **Cloud Native Computing Foundation.** "State of Cloud Native Development 2024." Cloud Native Computing Foundation, 2024.
sources.summary: Annual assessment of cloud native trends, including infrastructure automation and platform engineering capabilities.

sources.title: **Martin, R.** "Clean Architecture: A Craftsman's Guide to Software Structure." Prentice Hall, 2017.
sources.summary: Foundational text describing component cohesion, coupling, and architectural boundaries for resilient systems.

sources.title: **Atlassian.** "Documentation as Code: Treating Docs as a First-Class Citizen." Atlassian Developer, 2023.
sources.summary: Explores how treating documentation as code improves traceability, review quality, and collaboration workflows.

sources.title: **GitLab.** "Documentation as Code: Best Practices and Implementation." GitLab Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Guidance on building documentation pipelines that align with code review and continuous delivery practices.

sources.title: **HashiCorp.** "Terraform Security Best Practices." HashiCorp Learning Resources, 2023.
sources.summary: Recommends patterns for protecting Terraform state, credentials, and execution environments in regulated settings.

sources.title: **Pulumi.** "Testing Infrastructure as Code Programs." Pulumi Blog, 2024.
sources.summary: Outlines automated testing strategies for infrastructure as code programmes, spanning unit and integration coverage.

sources.title: **AWS.** "AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) Developer Guide." https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/latest/guide/home.html
sources.summary: Comprehensive reference for modelling cloud infrastructure in code using the AWS CDK framework.

sources.title: **Google Cloud.** "Store Terraform state in Cloud Storage." Google Cloud Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Describes Google Cloud storage backends for Terraform state management with security controls and automation hooks.

sources.title: **Microsoft Learn.** "Store Terraform state in Azure Storage." Microsoft Learn Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Provides guidance for storing Terraform state securely in Azure storage accounts and integrating with pipelines.

sources.title: **HashiCorp.** "Securing Terraform State." HashiCorp Developer Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Details encryption, role separation, and policy guardrails for Terraform state stored in Terraform Cloud.

sources.title: **HashiCorp.** "Backend Type: s3." HashiCorp Developer Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Explains how to configure and harden the S3 backend for Terraform state in multi-team deployments.

sources.title: **Open Policy Agent.** "Policy as Code Overview." https://www.openpolicyagent.org/docs/latest/
sources.summary: Summarises how to codify governance controls using OPA and integrate Rego policies into delivery pipelines.

sources.title: **Thoughtworks Technology Radar.** "Governance as Code." https://www.thoughtworks.com/radar/techniques/governance-as-code
sources.summary: Discusses how governance as code accelerates compliance whilst maintaining developer autonomy.

sources.title: **Structurizr.** "Structurizr DSL Language Reference." Structurizr Documentation, 2024.
sources.summary: Reference for modelling systems using the Structurizr DSL and automating diagram generation.

sources.title: **Architecture Decision Records Community.** "ADR Guidelines and Templates." https://adr.github.io
sources.summary: Provides standardised templates and best practice advice for capturing architecture decision records.
